pages.text: 45|2|Nuzuli [in] kitoʙ az coniʙi Allohi sikastnopaziri hakim ast
45|3|Ba rosti, ki dar osmonho va zamin nisonahoe [az qudrati ilohi] ʙaroi mu'minon [padidor] ast
45|4|Va [niz] dar ofarinisi xudaton va mavcudoti zindae, ki [dar zamin] parokanda mesozad, ʙaroi ahli jaqin nisonahoe [az tavon va tadʙiri Alloh taolo oskor] ast

45|5|Va dar gardisi pajopaji saʙu ruz va rizqe, ki Alloh taolo [ʙa surati ʙoron] az osmon mefiristad va ʙo on zaminro pas az xazon va xuskias zinda mesozad va [niz] dar gardisi ʙodho ʙaroi xiradvarzon, nisonahoe [az qudrati Parvardigor] ast
45|6|[Ej pajomʙar] Inho ojot [va nisonaho]-i ilohist, ki ʙa haq ʙar tu mexonem [Ba rosti, musrikon] pas az [suxani] Alloh taolo va ojotas kadom suxanro ʙovar mekunand
45|8|[On kofire] ki ojoti ilohiro, ki ʙar u xonda mesavad, mesunavad, vale mutakaʙʙirona ʙar muxolifat isror dorad. Gui onhoro nasunidaast. Pas, uro ʙa azoʙe dardnok ʙasorat ʙideh
45|9|[Hamon ki] cun ʙar gusae az ojoti Mo voqif savad, onro ʙa masxara megirad. Onon azoʙe sanginu dardnok [dar pes] dorand
45|10|Pesopesi eson [dar oxirat] duzax ast va dastovardason va [jovaronu] korsozone, ki ʙa coji Alloh taolo ʙarguzidaand, hec sude ʙa holason naxohand dost va azoʙe sahmgin [dar pes] dorand
45|11|In [Qur'on muciʙi] hidojat ast va kasone, ki ojoti Parvardigorasonro inkor mekunand, azoʙe az saxttarin azoʙhoi dardnoki [duzaxro dar pes] dorand
45|12|Alloh taolo ast, ki darjohoro dar xidmati sumo gumost, to kistiho ʙa farmonas dar on ravon savand va [sumo ʙitavoned] az fazli U [ruzi] ʙicued, ʙosad, ki sipos guzored
45|13|On ci dar osmonho va zamin ast, az [rahmati] xes dar xidmati sumo gumost, ki dar in [amr] ʙaroi andesamandon nisonahoe [az lutf va qudrati ilohi] ast
